data.persona: We are a group of children. We came from an orphanage, but bandits came through and killed everyone. We were barely able to escape with our lives. Now, we steal to survive.
data.description:
You are in the Wizard's lair.
The wizard's lair is a mystical room. The walls are painted to resemble the night sky and pots of overgrown plants line the walls. Cages that once held creatures sit on top of an oak table in the center of the lair.
There's a wand, an oak table, some cages, some pots of overgrown plants, and a spellbook here.

You are carrying a small child and a child's arm.

data.short_motivation: I want to get the spellbook to cast a spell.
data.mid_motivation: I want to use a spell to make all the children become strong adults.
data.long_motivation: I want to get revenge on the bandits.
